definitions.definition: Not holy ; ( by extension ) evil , impure , or otherwise perverted.
examples: The priest's unholy behaviour brought the church into disrepute.

definitions.definition: Dreadful , terrible , excessive , or otherwise atrocious .
examples: What an unholy mess your room is in!
I've been spending an unholy amount of time trying to write a novel!

main_definition: Not holy ; ( by extension ) evil , impure , or otherwise perverted.
secondary_definitions: Dreadful , terrible , excessive , or otherwise atrocious .
